fields.summary: Android: "touchFeedback" not working if borderRadius is set
fields.environment:
osx sierra,
Titanium SDK 6.1.1.GA
Android 6
Moto G4 Device

comments.body: -Failing review as I see a crash on android 5.1.1.-

Verified the fix with SDK 6.2.0.v20170711165607.

{{touchfeedback}} works as expected to show the ripple effect.

1.Checked with {{borderRadius}} & without.
2.Checked with various values of {{borderRadius}}.

Closing.
